IMP

MODULE IMP-SYNTAX

SYNTAX AExp ::= Int
| Id
| AExp / AExp [ strict ]
| AExp + AExp [ strict ]
| ( AExp )

SYNTAX BExp ::= Bool
| AExp <= AExp [ seqstrict ]
| not BExp [ strict ]
| BExp and BExp [ strict(1) ]
| ( BExp )

SYNTAX Stmt ::= skip
| Id := AExp [ strict(2) ]
| if BExp then Stmt else Stmt [ strict(1) ]
| while BExp do Stmt
| Stmt ; Stmt
| ( Stmt )

SYNTAX Pgm ::= var Ids ; Stmt

SYNTAX Ids ::= List{#Id,","}

SYNTAX Start ::= Pgm

END MODULE

MODULE IMP

CONFIGURATION :
T

k

$PGM
env

  ·  

SYNTAX KResult ::= Int
| Bool

RULE
k

X
I
env

X ↦ I

RULE
k

X := I
  ·  
env

X ↦
_
I

RULE
I1 + I2
I1 +Int I2

RULE
I1 / I2
I1 /Int I2
when I2 =/=K 0

RULE
I1 <= I2
I1 <=Int I2

RULE
not T
notBool T

RULE
true and B
B

RULE
false and B
false

RULE
skip
  ·  

RULE
S1 ; S2
S1 ↝ S2
[ structural ]

RULE
if true then S else _
S

RULE
if false then _ else S
S

RULE
k

while B do S
if B then S ; while B do S else skip
[ structural ]

RULE
k

var X , Xs ; S
var Xs ; S
env

ρ
  ·  
X ↦ 0
when notBool X in keys ρ

RULE
k

var   ·   ; S
S
[ structural ]

END MODULE
